data.title: Jim Carrey Girlfriends List – Just Speak News
data.text:
Jim Carrey is one of Hollywood’s most beloved actors, known for his comedic talents and larger-than-life personality. Over the years, Carrey has had a number of high-profile relationships with some of the industry’s most famous women. From actresses to models, Carrey has dated a diverse array of women. In this article, we will explore Jim Carrey’s girlfriends list and delve into 7 interesting facts about his romantic history.

1. Melissa Womer (1987-1995)

Jim Carrey’s first wife was Melissa Womer, a comedy club waitress-turned-actress. The couple married in 1987 and had one daughter together, Jane Carrey. Unfortunately, their marriage ended in divorce in 1995. Despite their split, Carrey and Womer remain on good terms and co-parent their daughter.

2. Lauren Holly (1994-1997)

After his divorce from Melissa Womer, Jim Carrey began dating actress Lauren Holly. The couple met on the set of the film “Dumb and Dumber” and quickly hit it off. They got engaged in 1996 but ultimately called off their engagement and parted ways in 1997.

3. Renee Zellweger (1999)

Jim Carrey briefly dated actress Renee Zellweger in 1999. The couple met on the set of the film “Me, Myself & Irene” and were spotted together at various red carpet events. However, their relationship was short-lived, and they soon went their separate ways.

4. Jenny McCarthy (2005-2010)

One of Jim Carrey’s most high-profile relationships was with actress and former Playboy model Jenny McCarthy. The couple began dating in 2005 and were known for their playful and affectionate public displays of affection. They split in 2010, with both parties citing their busy schedules as the reason for the breakup.

5. Anchal Joseph (2011)

In 2011, Jim Carrey was rumored to be dating model Anchal Joseph. The couple was spotted together at various events, sparking rumors of a romance. However, their relationship was never officially confirmed, and they eventually went their separate ways.

6. Cathriona White (2012-2015)

Jim Carrey’s most tragic relationship was with makeup artist Cathriona White. The couple began dating in 2012 and had an on-again, off-again relationship for several years. In 2015, White tragically took her own life, leaving Carrey devastated. He later faced a wrongful death lawsuit filed by White’s estranged husband and mother, though the case was eventually dismissed.

7. Ginger Gonzaga (2019-2022)

Most recently, Jim Carrey was in a relationship with actress Ginger Gonzaga. The couple met on the set of the TV show “Kidding” and quickly hit it off. They made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Golden Globes in 2019. However, their relationship ended in 2022, with both parties citing their busy schedules as the reason for the breakup.

Now that we’ve explored Jim Carrey’s girlfriends list, let’s delve into 7 interesting facts about his romantic history:

1. Jim Carrey has been married twice, first to Melissa Womer and then to Lauren Holly.

2. Carrey has a daughter, Jane Carrey, with his first wife Melissa Womer.

3. Carrey has dated several fellow actors, including Lauren Holly and Renee Zellweger.

4. His relationship with Cathriona White ended tragically with her suicide in 2015.

5. Carrey’s relationship with Jenny McCarthy was one of his most publicized romances.

6. He has been known to have a playful and affectionate public persona in his relationships.

7. Carrey has had a diverse range of partners, from models to makeup artists to fellow actors.

Now, let’s answer some common questions about Jim Carrey’s romantic history:

1. How old is Jim Carrey?

Jim Carrey was born on January 17, 1962, making him 62 years old in the year 2024.

2. How tall is Jim Carrey?

Jim Carrey stands at 6 feet 2 inches tall.

3. How much does Jim Carrey weigh?

Jim Carrey’s weight fluctuates, but he is typically around 185 pounds.

4. What is Jim Carrey’s net worth?

As of 2024, Jim Carrey’s net worth is estimated to be around $180 million.

5. Who was Jim Carrey’s first wife?

Jim Carrey’s first wife was Melissa Womer, whom he married in 1987.

6. How many children does Jim Carrey have?

Jim Carrey has one daughter, Jane Carrey, with his first wife Melissa Womer.

7. Who was Jim Carrey engaged to in 1996?

Jim Carrey was engaged to actress Lauren Holly in 1996.

8. Who did Jim Carrey date in 1999?

Jim Carrey briefly dated actress Renee Zellweger in 1999.

9. Who was Jim Carrey’s most high-profile relationship with?

Jim Carrey’s most high-profile relationship was with actress Jenny McCarthy.

10. Who did Jim Carrey date in 2012?

Jim Carrey dated makeup artist Cathriona White in 2012.

11. Who did Jim Carrey date in 2019?

Jim Carrey dated actress Ginger Gonzaga in 2019.

12. How did Cathriona White die?

Cathriona White tragically took her own life in 2015.

13. How long were Jim Carrey and Jenny McCarthy together?

Jim Carrey and Jenny McCarthy were together for five years, from 2005 to 2010.

14. What was the reason for Jim Carrey’s breakup with Ginger Gonzaga?

Jim Carrey and Ginger Gonzaga cited their busy schedules as the reason for their breakup in 2022.

15. What is Jim Carrey’s relationship status in 2024?

As of 2024, Jim Carrey’s current relationship status is unknown.

In summary, Jim Carrey has had a colorful romantic history, dating a variety of women from different backgrounds. From his marriages to Melissa Womer and Lauren Holly to his high-profile relationships with Jenny McCarthy and Cathriona White, Carrey’s love life has been a topic of much speculation and interest. Despite the ups and downs of his romantic relationships, Carrey remains one of Hollywood’s most beloved and talented actors, known for his comedic genius and larger-than-life personality.
